type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyRunWar
type.description:
Deploys a WAR to an embedded Jetty web container.

Once started, the web container can be configured to run continuously, scanning for changes to the war file and automatically performing a hot redeploy when necessary.

@deprecated The Jetty plugin has been deprecated

method.name: getWebApp
method.description: Returns the web application to deploy.

property.name: webApp
property.description: Returns the web application to deploy.
